content.rendered:
Air Senegal Blaise Diagne International Airport, Senegal

Air Senegal Blaise Diagne International Airport, Senegal Address:
Blaise Diagne International Airport DIASS
BP 099 DIASS-AIBD

Air Senegal in Dakar, Senegal

La Rotonde Building Rue Amadou Assane Ndoye Dakar, Senegal

Air Senegal in Ziguinchor, Senegal

Ziguinchor Airport,
BP 30 Ziguinchor, Senegal

Phone:
xl2phone

Email: xl2email

Air Senegal Official website: https://flyairsenegal.com/

Air Senegal Online Check-in: https://flyairsenegal.com/planifier/check-in-enregistrement/

Note: Check-in Online departure airport not later than 90 minutes before the flight.

Air Senegal Baggage

View Air Senegal checked baggage allowance, hand luggage allowance in the above link.

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Air Senegal

Total fleet: 5

Boeing 737

  • Boeing 737-700

Fokker F50/F60

  • Fokker F50

Queries handled by Air Senegal Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class

About Air Senegal:

Air Senegal is the national airline of Senegal. The new national airline, Air Senegal, aims to be the leader in West African air transport based on the regional HUB AIBD (International Airport Blaise Diagne). Its mission is to serve both domestic and international lines.

Air Senegal is a citizen company, with international standards, with a business model based on customer satisfaction and operational excellence, while respecting the safety and security standards of the aviation industry.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Senegal Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Senegal: (click on the stars below)
